component.name: FreeOrion
component.summary: FreeOrion is a turn-based space empire and galactic conquest (4X) computer game.

description.p: FreeOrion is a free, open source, turn-based space empire and galactic conquest (4X) computer game being designed and built by the FreeOrion project. FreeOrion is inspired by the tradition of the Master of Orion games, but is not a clone or remake of that series or any other game.
This is a major release. There are lots of changes, including a complete all-original soundtrack, new graphics, sound effects, vast gameplay improvements, and much more!
